items.title: Aboriginal deaths in custody in NSW have reached a record high

items.title: Victorian Coalition pledges to tear up Treaty laws if elected in 2026
items.summary: Victoria’s Opposition has vowed to scrap the state’s landmark Treaty legislation within 100 days if it wins government in 2026 - pledging instead to create a new First Nations department.

items.summary: Trump announced a new era of peace, as Hamas freed the remaining hostages and Israel released nearly 2,000 prisoners and detainees.
